recruit.name: Recruit
recruit.details: A stripped down role capable of only self-defence.

squadleader.name: Senior Rifleman
squadleader.details: The head of the squad, this role provides the user the ability to place Rally Points (RPs) and FOBs, as well as Deployables.

crewman_squadleader.name: Lead Crewman
crewman_squadleader.details: Required for the operation of armored vehicles like IFVs, APCs and tanks. This role comes with a stripped down kit for self-defense.

pilot_squadleader.name: Lead Pilot
pilot_squadleader.details: Required to operate helicopters. This role comes with a stripped down kit for self-defense.

medic.name: Medic
medic.details: Critical to the survivability of a squad, Medics are capable of quickly reviving and healing incapacitated/wounded teammates.

rifleman.name: Rifleman
rifleman.details: Equipped with a standard loadout, this role is perfect for general purpose combat.

automaticrifleman.name: Automatic Rifleman
automaticrifleman.details: Provides sustained direct fire support and suppression for the Squad.

grenadier.name: Grenadier
grenadier.details: Provides indirect fire support with launched grenades, can also mark targets with launched smoke markers.

lightantitank.name: Rifleman Anti-Tank
lightantitank.details: Capable of dealing with most light armour and vehicle threats, as well as entrenched enemies.

scout.name: Scout
scout.details: Used primarily to scout ahead of a main force to find paths or approaches onto objectives, more capable at short-range combat for eliminating sentries.

machinegunner.name: Machine Gunner
machinegunner.details: Capable of sustained medium to long range direct fire support and suppression.

heavyantitank.name: Heavy Anti-Tank
heavyantitank.details: Equipped with a heavier Anti-Tank Rocket Launcher, this kit is suitable for engaging heavy armor.

engineer.name: Combat Engineer
engineer.details: Equipped with Explosives and Mines, the Combat Engineer can deny the enemy area control. He can also assist in vehicle repairs, construct/destruct deployables faster and set up sandbags and wire independently.

sniper.name: Sniper
sniper.details: Capable of precision medium to long range direct fire support, this role’s weapon comes equipped with a powerful optic.

crewman.name: Crewman
crewman.details: Required for the operation of armored vehicles like IFVs, APCs and tanks. This role comes with a stripped down kit for self-defense.

pilot.name: Pilot
pilot.details: Required to operate helicopters. This role comes with a stripped down kit for self-defense.
